item.title: China's New Real Estate Boom? Using satellite data to quantify over-expansion in fixed assets
item.description: China’s New Real Estate Boom? Using satellite data to quantify over-expansion in fixed assets # Contents # Satellite Data: Night Time Lights (NTL) Verifying the Data Set: Tesla, Rare Earths, Eastern China China Fixed Asset Growth by Province Takeaways Why You Should Read This Post # We use an innovative alternative data set – satellite Night Time Lights (NTL) – to quantify China’s expansion in fixed assets (real estate, factories, infrastructure).

item.title: It's Coming - A property crash similar in scale and economic significance to that in the US 2007-08
item.description: It’s Coming: A property crash similar in scale and economic significance to that in the US 2007-08 # Contents # Faltering Real Estate Prices The Three Eras of China’s Economic Development Takeaways Why You Should Read This Post # In recent years, Chinese gross investment has continued to look quite strong, but more and more of it has merely been to replace wearing-out or obsolescing fixed capital, and net investment — the [aggregate] profit source — has been on a long and gradual and steepening decline [from ~2010].
